text: Grbavica is a 2006 Bosnian Austrian German Croatian war movie directed by Jasmila Žbanić and starring Mirjana Karanović, Luna Mijović, Leon Lučev, Jasna Beri, Ermin Bravo, Dejan Aćimović, Bogdan Diklić, Jasna Žalica. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:Austrian movies Category:German movies Category:Croatian movies Category:Movies directed by Jasmila Žbanić Category:Movies set in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: Grbavica (movie)
